title: What are the characteristics of technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are 2 characteristics of developed technology: Usefulness: Developed technology should have purpose and be useful. Reliability: If a technology is “developed,” then I would expect it to work well and be reliable, otherwise I wouldn’t consider it to be developed. “Developed,” is qualitative, and technology is never fully developed. All technology is still advancing and becoming more developed!
